name: Dodge Z Ball
description:
Dodge Z Ball, Is Arena based, first-person action game focusing on survival mode style game play, where you must manipulate a single Dodgeball to destroy your enemies and survive the dodgeball onslaught.

Controls:
WASD - Movement
Left mouse - Fires Dodgeball and recalls(rewind back) your dodgeball
Right mouse - Curves the dodge ball until it hits a surface Shift - Dash
Deflects incoming projectile by holding on to your dodgeball and facing them.

Team:

Shaq - Developer

Sully - Developer

Ji_Rath - Developer/Artist

Vitor - Sound Developer
